verses.verse: וַֽיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi used כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol now the whole הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz And the whole earth שָׂפָ֣ה <S%H8193><s%> sa-Fah language אֶחָ֑ת <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chat; was of one וּדְבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> u-de-va-Rim speech אֲחָדִֽים׃ <S%H259><s%> 'a-cha-Dim. and of one

וַֽיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came בְּנָסְעָ֣ם <S%H5265><s%> be-na-se-'Am And it came to pass as they journeyed מִקֶּ֑דֶם <S%H6924><s%> mik-Ke-dem; from the east וַֽיִּמְצְא֥וּ <S%H4672><s%> vai-yim-tze-'U that they found בִקְעָ֛ה <S%H1237><s%> vik-'Ah a plain בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land שִׁנְעָ֖ר <S%H8152><s%> shin-'Ar of Shinar וַיֵּ֥שְׁבוּ <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-she-vu and they dwelt שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> Sham. there

וַיֹּאמְר֞וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru And they said אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about רֵעֵ֗הוּ <S%H7453><s%> re-'E-hu, to another הָ֚בָה <S%H3051><s%> Ha-vah Go to נִלְבְּנָ֣ה <S%H3835><s%> nil-be-Nah let us make לְבֵנִ֔ים <S%H3843><s%> le-ve-Nim, brick וְנִשְׂרְפָ֖ה <S%H8313><s%> ve-nis-re-Fah and burn לִשְׂרֵפָ֑ה <S%H8316><s%> lis-re-Fah; them throughly וַתְּהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> vat-te-Hi had לָהֶ֤ם la-Hem הַלְּבֵנָה֙ <S%H3843><s%> hal-le-ve-Nah And they had brick לְאָ֔בֶן <S%H68><s%> le-'A-ven, for stone וְהַ֣חֵמָ֔ר <S%H2564><s%> ve-Ha-che-Mar, and slime הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah used לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem לַחֹֽמֶר׃ <S%H2563><s%> la-Cho-mer. they for morter

וַיֹּאמְר֞וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru And they said הָ֣בָה׀ <S%H3051><s%> Ha-vah Go to נִבְנֶה־ <S%H1129><s%> niv-neh- let us build לָּ֣נוּ La-nu עִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> 'Ir, us a city וּמִגְדָּל֙ <S%H4026><s%> u-mig-Dal and a tower וְרֹאשׁ֣וֹ <S%H7218><s%> ve-ro-Sho whose top בַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> vash-sha-Ma-yim, [may reach] unto heaven וְנַֽעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> ve-na-'a-seh- and let us make לָּ֖נוּ La-nu שֵׁ֑ם <S%H8034><s%> Shem; us a name פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- otherwise נָפ֖וּץ <S%H6327><s%> na-Futz lest we be scattered abroad עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei upon the face כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol of the whole הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. of the whole earth

וַיֵּ֣רֶד <S%H3381><s%> vai-Ye-red came down יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, And the LORD לִרְאֹ֥ת <S%H7200><s%> lir-'Ot to see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir the city וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַמִּגְדָּ֑ל <S%H4026><s%> ham-mig-Dal; and the tower אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בָּנ֖וּ <S%H1129><s%> ba-Nu builded בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei which the children הָאָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam. of men

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> hen Behold עַ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am Behold the people אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad [is] one וְשָׂפָ֤ה <S%H8193><s%> ve-sa-Fah language אַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chat and they have all one לְכֻלָּ֔ם <S%H3605><s%> le-chul-Lam, all וְזֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> ve-Zeh and this הַחִלָּ֣ם <S%H2490><s%> ha-chil-Lam and this they begin לַעֲשׂ֑וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot; to do וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah and now לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not יִבָּצֵ֣ר <S%H1219><s%> yib-ba-Tzer will be restrained מֵהֶ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> me-Hem, and they כֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> kol all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יָזְמ֖וּ <S%H2161><s%> ya-ze-Mu from them which they have imagined לַֽעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <S%H6213><s%> La-'a-Sot. to do

הָ֚בָה <S%H3051><s%> Ha-vah Go to נֵֽרְדָ֔ה <S%H3381><s%> ne-re-Dah, let us go down וְנָבְלָ֥ה <S%H1101><s%> ve-na-ve-Lah and there confound שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> sham and there שְׂפָתָ֑ם <S%H8193><s%> se-fa-Tam; their language אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo they will not יִשְׁמְע֔וּ <S%H8085><s%> yish-me-'U, they may not understand אִ֖ישׁ <S%H582><s%> 'ish another שְׂפַ֥ת <S%H8193><s%> se-Fat speech רֵעֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H7453><s%> re-'E-hu. another's

וַיָּ֨פֶץ <S%H6327><s%> vai-Ya-fetz scattered them abroad יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh So the LORD אֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam מִשָּׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> mish-Sham from thence עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei upon the face כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol of the whole הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; of all the earth וַֽיַּחְדְּל֖וּ <S%H2308><s%> vai-yach-de-Lu and they left off לִבְנֹ֥ת <S%H1129><s%> liv-Not to build הָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir. the city

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over כֵּ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> ken after that קָרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> ka-Ra called שְׁמָהּ֙ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mah Therefore is the name of it בָּבֶ֔ל <S%H894><s%> ba-Vel, Babel כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because שָׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there בָּלַ֥ל <S%H1101><s%> ba-Lal did there confound יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh because the LORD שְׂפַ֣ת <S%H8193><s%> se-Fat the language כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of the whole הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; of all the earth וּמִשָּׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> u-mish-Sham there הֱפִיצָ֣ם <S%H6327><s%> he-fi-Tzam scatter them abroad יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over פְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei upon the face כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of the whole הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. of all the earth פ Peh
